page.title: 07A schoolboy from Breamore
page.content: I have nearly always lived in Breamore.I have lived in Hope Cottage,Home Farm,Outwick Farm and now in Dairy Cottage. My Dad was brought up in Breamore by my Nan who still lives down the road. I get up about six thirty and have breakfast. Then I set off for my paper round which takes me round the marsh and along Upper Street. I do many rich and important houses like that of Sir Westrow Hulse. Lady Hulse is very nice to me. I have to walk about half a mile to catch the bus for Burgate School.I enjoy walking around Breamore especially on my way home from school.I can get into Breamore House and the Museum free.The trouble is, though , that I don't see my friends as much as I'd like.They live too far away.
